name: Haight Ashbury Food Program
description: Founded in 1983, the Haight Ashbury Food Program is a nonprofit organization with a mission to support the principle that freedom from hunger is a right, not a privilege. They provide meals and referral services to those in need while fostering a sense of belonging and self worth for all involved.
